website_summaries.verdict: Choose this sulfate-free shampoo if you are looking for an affordable option that works well for most types of curls. The scent is likely to impress you as well.
pros: Smooths frizz and moisturizes tight curls thanks to glycerin and a trio of oils: coconut, macadamia, and jojoba
Made with vitamins and fruit proteins that may strengthen hair
Vegan and free of parabens and silicone
cons: Feels somewhat heavy, so it's not ideal for thin or fine hair
If your hair is very coarse, it may not improve texture

product_meta.description: Color:Curl Nourish Shampoo| Size:1 CountHair is almost entirely made up of protein, which gives hair its strength. ALL NEW, paraben-free Fructis formulas with Active Fruit Protein, an exclusive combination of citrus protein, Vitamins B3 & B6, fruit & plant-derived extracts and strengthening conditioners, are designed for healthier, stronger hair. Sulfate-free and silicone-free Fructis Triple Nutrition Curl Nourish Shampoo, with Coconut, Jojoba and Macadamia Oils, provides a supple lather for a gentle cleanse, that doesn't strip hair's natural moisture, and intense nourishment for stronger, well defined, smoother, frizz-resistant curls.
feature_bullets: It builds weightless, thicker-looking volume, and enhances natural movement
Works especially well in areas of high humidity
Protects hair during aggressive heat styling up to 446 degrees
